events.title: Woodworking in action
events.description: Experience the joy of building things with your hands using wood and various woodworking tools.

events.title: Composting 101
events.description: Gardening is fun and a great way to learn about the world and environment. Learn to compost today and help reduce waste in the process!

events.title: Board Game Night
events.description: Come play with various gamers from around the city. The nights special event is Settlers of Catan!

events.title: Air Guitaring Basics
events.description: We're putting together a band, wanna join? This is a workshop to help people getting started in the extreme world of air guitar.

events.title: Build The Web
events.description: We will be discussing new ways of building websites/web apps. From plain javascript, css and html to frameworks like Angular including plugins like JQuery and React.

events.title: Real Estate Talk
events.description: Discussion of what the market is like and talks from experience realtors about their experience and advice on being successful.

events.title: Race Car Driver Meeting
events.description: We'll be talking about the races happening around the country, free food and drinks!

events.title: Learning The Easy Way
events.description: We're a group of teachers talking about tutoring and ways to help our students learn the new curriculum

events.title: Fight Club
events.description: It's not a real fight club, just fans of the movie and we like to talk about it.

events.title: Hardcore Dancers Anonymous
events.description: We're providing a place for survivors of hardcore dancing to talk about the shows they went to and came out of the mosh pits tattered and broken.
